page.title: 08FAMILY LIFE- EMPLOYED 1
page.content: Family life tends to follow quite a regular pattern. I earn enough for us to live comfortably and my working hours are regular so I have time to be with my children. My wife works part time because we think it is important for there to be someone in the house when the children come home from school. We have a car and manage to take regular holidays. I am happier for my children to be brought up in an area like this. I think the education in the local school is better than any they would get in a Cardiff school. I also think that there is less chance of then getting involved in drugs, glue sniffing and other bad habits. I think the children are envious of other children who live in towns but believe they are better off here.
